section.title: Viewing a Flavor
section.para: You can click on a specific flavor to view its details. The screen provides you with a Flavor Accordion and a Flavor Summary.

listitem.para: Use Flavor Summary Views to change how you are looking at the Summary.
Use the Flavor Accordion to view the Properties of the flavor and its Relationships.
Use the Flavor Summary to see details on Properties (CPUs, CPU Cores, Memory), Relationships (Cloud Provider, Instances), and Smart Management (Company Tags).
